facts.1: Fact 1: Blueberries are native to North America and have been enjoyed for centuries.
facts.2: Fact 2: Blueberries are rich in antioxidants and vitamins, making them a healthy snack.
facts.3: Fact 3: July is National Blueberry Month in the United States.

facts.1: Fact 1: Video Game Day is celebrated on July 8th each year.
facts.2: Fact 2: The first commercially successful video game was Pong, released in 1972.
facts.3: Fact 3: The video game industry is one of the fastest-growing entertainment industries in the world.

facts.1: Fact 1: Math 2.0 Day celebrates the intersection of mathematics and technology.
facts.2: Fact 2: The day encourages the use of technology to make math more accessible and engaging.
facts.3: Fact 3: Math 2.0 Day is celebrated on July 8th each year.
